name: Softshell Jacket
description:
Carrying Capacity: 3K µSCU
Perfect for weathering any storm, Alejo Brothers' Softshell poncho is built from multi-layered waterproof weave technology and features an extra wide size to keep your personal gear clear and dry without restricting your arm movement.
description_cn:
储物空间：3K μSCU
阿莱霍兄弟的“软壳”披风非常适合任何风暴天气穿着，其采用多层防水编织技术制成，并且尺寸超大，可确保您的个人装备清洁干燥，而又不会限制手臂的活动。
